insert into t_tcffc_prize (lottery_code, no, prize, wan, qian, bai, shi, ge, online_num, adjust_num, alias_no, lottery_date, time ) values (#{lotteryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wan,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{qian,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bai,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shi,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{onlineNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adjustNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{aliasNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lotteryDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update t_tcffc_prize
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
lottery_code = #{record.lotteryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
no = #{record.no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prize = #{record.prize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wan = #{record.wan,jdbcType=INTEGER},
qian = #{record.qian,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bai = #{record.bai,jdbcType=INTEGER},

alias_no = #{record.aliasNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lottery_date = #{record.lotteryDate,jdbcType=DATE},

lottery_code = #{lotteryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
no = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prize = #{prize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wan = #{wan,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
